item.description:
Let's meet to watch the Cubs play the Astros at the Bostonville Grille.

About the Bostonville Grille:
The Bostonville Grille is a great place to meet and eat with friends and family! We offer a casual atmosphere with a flavorful menu. As you will see the menu offers tons of appetizers, main courses and a fun kid's menu, sure to please all!

Whether you prefer to sit at a large table or choose a more cozy booth with your own TV, your options for enjoying your dining experience vary depending on your wishes.

No matter where you sit, you can still see the game!

Menu:

http://bostonville.ne...

Directions:

http://bostonville.ne...
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a meetup sign and will be wearing a cubs cap.

group.name: Chicago Sports Club of New England

item.name: Major League Baseball: Chicago Cubs @ Houston Astros
